Verses: 1 ippadiyirukka, Kiristhu Namakkaaga Maamsaththile Paadupattapadiyaal, Neengalum Appadippatta Sindhaiyai Aayudhamaagath Thariththukkollungal.

2 enendraal Maamsaththil Paadupadugiravan Ini Maamsaththilirukkum Kaalamvaraikkum Manusharudaiya Ichchaigalinpadi Pizhaikkaamal Dhevanudaiya Siththaththinpadiye Pizhaikkaththakkadhaagap Paavangalai Vittoindhiruppaan.

3 sendra Vaazhnaat Kaalaththile Naam Purajaadhigaludaiya Ishtaththinpadi Nadandhukondadhu Podhum; Appozhudhu Naam Kaamavigaaraththaiyum Thurichchaigalaiyum Natappiththu, Madhubaanampanni, Kaliyaattuch Seydhu, Verikondu, Aruvaruppaana Vikkirakaaraadhanaiyaich Seydhuvandhom.
4 anthath Thunmaarkka Ulaiyile Avargalodekooda Neengal Vizhaamalirukkiradhinaale Avargal Aachchariyappattu, Ungalaith Thooshikkiraargal.
5 uyirodirukkiravargalukkum Mariththorgalukkum Niyaayaththeerppukkodukka Aayaththamaayirukkiravarukku Avargal Kanakkoppuvippaargal.
6 idharkaaga Mariththoraanavargal, Manushar Munpaaga Maamsaththile Aakkinaikkullaakkappattirundhu, Dhevanmunpaaga Aaviyile Pizhaikkumpadiyaaga, Avargalukkum Suvisesham Arivikkappattadhu.
7 ellaavatrirkum Mudivu Sameepamaayitru; Aagaiyaal Thelindha Puththiyullavargalaayirundhu, Jebampannuvadharku Jaakkiradhaiyullavargalaayirungal.
8 ellaavatrirkum Melaaga Oruvariloruvar Ookkamaana Anbullavargalaayirungal; Anbu Thiralaana Paavangalai Moodum.
10 avanavan Petra Varaththinpadiye Neengal Dhevanudaiya Parpala Kirubaiyulla Eevugalaip Pakirndhukodukkum Nalla Ukkiraanakkaararpola, Oruvarukkoruvar Udhaviseyyungal.

11 oruvan Podhiththaal Dhevanudaiya Vaakkiyangalinpadi Podhikkakkadavan; Oruvan Udhaviseydhaal Dhevan Thandharulum Belaththinpadi Seyyakkadavan; Ellaavatrileyum Yesukiristhumoolamaai Dhevan Magimaippadumpadiye Seyveergalaaga; Avarukke Magimaiyum Vallamaiyum Sadhaakaalangalilum Undaayiruppadhaaga. Aamen.
12 piriyamaanavargale, Ungalaich Sodhikkumpadi Ungal Naduvil Patriyerigira Akkiniyaikkuriththu Edho Pudhumaiyendru Thigaiyaamal,
13 kiristhuvin Magimaivelippadumpodhu Neengal Kalikoorndhu Magizhumpadiyaaga Avarudaiya Paadugalukku Neengal Pangaaligalaanadhaal Sandhoshappadungal.

14 neengal Kiristhuvin Naamaththinimiththam Nindhikkappattaal Paakkiyavaangal; Enendraal Dhevanudaiya Aaviyaagiya Magimaiyulla Aaviyaanavar Ungalmel Thangiyirukkiraar; Avargalaale Thooshikkappadugiraar; Ungalaale Magimaippadugiraar.
15 aadhalaal Ungalil Oruvanum Kolaipaadhaganaayaavadhu, Thirudanaayaavadhu, Pollaangu Seydhavanaayaavadhu, Anniya Kaariyangalil Thalaiyittukkondavanaayaavadhu Paadupatugiravanaayirukkakkoodaadhu.
16 oruvan Kiristhavanaayiruppadhinaal Paadupattaal Vetkappadaamalirundhu, Adhinimiththam Dhevanai Magimaippaduththakkadavan.
17 niyaayaththeerppu Dhevanudaiya Veettile Thuvakkungaalamaayirukkiradhu; Munthi Nammidaththile Athu Thuvakkinaal Dhevanudaiya Suviseshaththirkuk Keezhppadiyaadhavargalin Mudivu Ennamaayirukkum?
18 needhimaane Iratchikkappatuvadhu Aridhaanaal, Pakdhiyillaadhavanum Paaviyum Enge Nirpaan?
19 aagaiyaal Dhevanudaiya Siththaththinpadi Paadanubavikkiravargal Nanmaiseygiravargalaaith Thangal Aaththumaakkalai Unmaiyulla Sirushtikarththaavaagiya Avarukku Oppukkotukkakkadavargal.
